All the plots are vastu compliant. ,Marsur, is well-connected to other parts of the city via rail and road transportation. The City Junction Railway Station is located at a distance of 32.1 kilometres while the ,HAL, International Airport is located 29.3 kilometresaway. Social infrastructure in the locality entails popular educational institutions, hotels, premium hospitals as well as shopping malls and recreational centres.,read more
